tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE loan_applications (
    application_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id UUID,
    loan_amount DECIMAL,
    application_date DATE,
    approval_status VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE LoanApplications (
    application_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id UUID,
    loan_amount DECIMAL,
    application_date DATE,
    approval_status VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE loan_applications (
    application_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id UUID,
    loan_amount DECIMAL,
    application_date TIMESTAMP,
    status VARCHAR(10)
);

CREATE TABLE customer_profiles (
    customer_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name VARCHAR(50),
    last_name VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(50),
    phone_number VARCHAR(15),
    address TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE loan_approvals (
    approval_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    application_id UUID,
    approval_date TIMESTAMP,
    approved_amount DECIMAL,
    approved_by VARCHAR(50)
);
CREATE TABLE loan_applications (id INT PRIMARY KEY, customer_id INT, amount DECIMAL(10,2), status VARCHAR(20), application_date TIMESTAMP);
CREATE TABLE customers (id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(50), email VARCHAR(50), phone_number VARCHAR(20), address VARCHAR(100));
CREATE TABLE approvals (id INT PRIMARY KEY, application_id INT, employee_id INT, approval_date TIMESTAMP, remarks VARCHAR(200));
CREATE TABLE employees (id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(50), title VARCHAR(50), department VARCHAR(50));

CREATE TABLE LoanApplications (
  application_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id UUID,
  loan_amount DECIMAL,
  application_status VARCHAR(50),
  date_submitted TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE Customers (
  customer_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  first_name VARCHAR(50),
  last_name VARCHAR(50),
  email VARCHAR(100),
  phone_number VARCHAR(15)
)

CREATE TABLE Approvals (
  approval_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  application_id UUID,
  approval_status VARCHAR(50),
  approval_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE PersonalDetails (
  customer_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  dob DATE,
  address VARCHAR(100),
  employment_status VARCHAR(50),
  annual_income DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE Documents (
  document_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  document_type VARCHAR(50),
  description TEXT,
  document_link VARCHAR(255)
)
